Title: Elgin Pocket Watch 12-Size Open Face with Textured Dial CA1925
Description: Elgin 12-Size Open Face Pocket Watch with Textured Dial U.S.; Elgin; Man’s; Serial # 28,165,591; CA1925 CASE: The white gold-filled 12-size open face case features geometric and cartouche decorations. DIAL: This silver metal single sunk dial displays Arabic numerals and diamond hands. MOVT: This 17-jewel, stem-set, Grade 345 movement with lever escapement is nickel with a ¾-plate layout. C 3 (The case is in very good condition) D 3-15 (The dial is in very good condition, spotted) M 3-6 (The movement is in very good condition, patinated) AI-OFWW42016-4 CUSTOMER SERVICE: Phone 1-800-424-5353 Contact: Rick Gilbert Hours:9 - 5 EST, Monday - Friday Address: eAshland_net Sarasota Arts & Antique Center 640 South Washington Blvd, Suite 200 Sarasota, FL 34236 INTERNATIONAL CUSTOMERS: Import duties, taxes and charges are not included in the item price or shipping charges.
